# AI Tree Scaffolder

**Stop creating folders manually.** AI Tree Scaffolder instantly turns ASCII directory trees (generated by ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude...) into actual folders and files in your VS Code workspace.

## ğŸš€ Features

* **AI Ready:** Perfect for pasting project structures suggested by LLMs.
* **Smart Parsing:** Handles standard tree characters (`â”œâ”€â”€`, `â””â”€â”€`) and simple indentation.
* **Zero Config:** Works right out of the box.
* **Context Aware:** Generates files relative to your workspace root or the folder you select.

## ğŸ“– Usage

1. **Paste** your ASCII tree structure into any file in VS Code.
2. **Highlight** the tree structure text.
3. **Right-click** the selection.
4. Select **Generate Files from Tree**.

## ğŸ’¡ Example Input

Simply highlight text that looks like this:

```text
my-new-app/
â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Header.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Footer.tsx
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ api.ts
â”œâ”€â”€ public/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ index.html
â””â”€â”€ package.json
````

## âš™ï¸ Extension Settings

This extension currently does not require any configuration. It automatically detects your workspace root.

## âš ï¸ Known Issues

* Filenames with special characters should be handled carefully.
* The extension creates **empty files**. It does not currently populate the files with content.
